name: The BORED Game
description:
Whenever You are BORED or AIMLESS! Just put ON the  MUSIC and START PLAYING THIS GAME! 

--------------------------------

This game was a learning experience for me as i incorporated many unity concepts in here! I'll be making more games where I incorporate more and more concepts!

And Possibly even start making my Dream Game soon.[SPOILER]

Anyways this is a simple game with lots of potential in it! I can make it evolve into a wonderful game later on when more knowledge has been gained!

-SamEminent

--------------------------------

Just an early prototype with unknown potential! Could evlove to something more later on!

I started making this game on Nov 18, 2021 and finished it on Nov 19, 2021.

------------------------------------

ENJOY!
